Weights.title: Weights
Weights.description: Weights created by running the FSRS optimizer. By default these are weights computed from a sample dataset. Coming soon: You will be able to create weights tuned to your own knowledge base by running your repetition history through the FSRS optimizer.

Request Retention.title: Request Retention
Request Retention.description: Represents the probability of recall you want to target. Note that there is a tradeoff between higher retention and higher number of repetitions. It is recommended that you set this value somewhere between 0.8 and 0.9.

Enable Fuzz.title: Enable Fuzz
Enable Fuzz.description: When enabled this adds a small random delay to new intervals to prevent cards from sticking together and always coming up for review on the same day.

Maximum Interval.title: Maximum Interval
Maximum Interval.description: The maximum number of days between repetitions.

Easy Bonus.title: Easy Bonus
Easy Bonus.description: An extra multiplier applied to the interval when a review card is answered Easy.
